//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "KAM7" );

	task ( "mullins" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/npc/mullins/kam7/02powerdown.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM7_003" );
	}

	dowait ( "mullins" );
	wait ( 3800.000 );

	task ( "computer" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/npc/kam7/computer/02critical.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM7_004" );
	}

	dowait ( "computer" );
}
